description: Triangle of distribution of rank sums: Wilcoxon's statistic.
references: F. N. David, M. G. Kendall and D. E. Barton, Symmetric Function and Allied Tables, Cambridge, 1966, p. 237.
formula: Let f(r) = Product( (x^i-x^(r+1))/(1-x^i), i = 1..r-3) / x^((r-2)*(r-3)/2); then expanding f(r) in powers of x and taking coefficients gives the successive rows of this triangle (with a different offset).
mathematica: f[r_] := Product[(x^i - x^(r+1))/(1 - x^i), {i, 1, r-3}]/x^((r-2)*(r-3)/2); row[r_] := CoefficientList[ Series[f[r], {x, 0, 3r+1}], x]; Table[row[r], {r, 6, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 30 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
